system.description:
As you work to incorporate your bonded artifact and magical training together, you have discovered that the combination of the two strengthens your ability to work with others. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your wielder levels count as bard levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.pbh0w05bubkg6nvl]{Font of Inspiration} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.qp4y5b36beo1vr46]{Battle Hymn Specialization} features.

  • Half your bard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iq8cqiia40rs54os]{Spellsword} feature, and you can use Spellsword with bard spells of 1st level or higher.

  • You gain proficiency with the Sanguine Knot combat tradition or another from the wielder list if you are already proficient. You gain a Sanguine Knot maneuver you qualify to learn, and it does not count against your maneuvers known.
